content: Send an invitation to add new members to your {{productName}}

comment.text: This translation key is used for a button that invites new members to join a room in the product, typically displayed on an "Empty View" container. The button sends an invitation notification containing the product name. It appears as a visible action element.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Lähetä kutsu lisätäksesi uusia jäseniä {{productName}}' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would emphasize adding members *to* the product.

The translation "Ուղարկեք հրավեր՝ ձեր {{productName}}-ին նոր անդամներ ավելացնելու համար" is a bit literal. A more natural Armenian phrasing would be something like "Հրավերակում ձեր {{productName}}-ին՝ նոր անդամներ ավելացնելու համար" or "Ձևացրեք հրավեր՝ ձեր {{productName}}-ին նոր անդամներ ավելացնելու համար" depending on the desired level of formality and nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Հրավերակում ձեր {{productName}}-ին՝ նոր անդամներ ավելացնելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses the plural form 'zaproszenia' (invitations) which might be slightly awkward. Using the singular 'zaproszenie' would be more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wyślij zaproszenie, aby dodać nowych członków do {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'sala' (room) doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'your [productName]'. While technically correct, it's a bit awkward and might confuse users. 'Produto' or a more generic term would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Envie um convite para adicionar novos membros ao seu {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබේ {{productName}} වෙත නව සාමාජිකයන් එක් කිරීමට ආරාධනාවක් යවන්න' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the action of inviting someone to join.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ {{productName}} වෙත නව සාමාජිකයන් පිළිගැනීමට ආරාධනාවක් යවන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pošlite pozvánku a pridajte nových členov do vášho {{productName}}' is a bit awkward. A more natural Slovak phrasing would emphasize sending the invitation *to* a room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pošlite pozvánku na pridanie nových členov do vášho {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "{{productName}} ürününüze yeni üyeler eklemek için bir davetiye gönderin" is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be '{{productName}}'e yeni üyeler eklemek için bir davetiye gönderin.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}}'e yeni üyeler eklemek için bir davetiye gönderin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '发送邀请以添加新成员到您的{{productName}}' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would be '向您的{{productName}}发送邀请，添加新成员'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 向您的{{productName}}发送邀请，添加新成员
